mapper.sql: prod_id, prod_name, prod_type, prod_norm, prod_material, prod_length, prod_level, prod_num, prod_record_weight, prod_rel_weight, prod_print_weight, prod_out_weight, prod_source_company, prod_status, prod_user_type, prod_source, prod_luno, prod_dcl_flag, prod_plan_no, prod_make_jz, prod_ori_id, prod_parent_no, prod_out_plan, prod_sale_serno, prod_out_carno, prod_out_date, prod_company, prod_customer, prod_bc, prod_fhck, prod_ruc, prod_wccply, prod_inputuser, prod_checkuser, crt_date, upd_date, remark
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from bsl_product_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into bsl_product_info (prod_id, prod_name, prod_type, prod_norm, prod_material, prod_length, prod_level, prod_num, prod_record_weight, prod_rel_weight, prod_print_weight, prod_out_weight, prod_source_company, prod_status, prod_user_type, prod_source, prod_luno, prod_dcl_flag, prod_plan_no, prod_make_jz, prod_ori_id, prod_parent_no, prod_out_plan, prod_sale_serno, prod_out_carno, prod_out_date, prod_company, prod_customer, prod_bc, prod_fhck, prod_ruc, prod_wccply, prod_inputuser, prod_checkuser, crt_date, upd_date, remark) values (#{prodId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{prodNorm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodMaterial,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{prodLength,jdbcType=REAL}, #{prodLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{prodNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prodRecordWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{prodRelWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{prodPrintWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{prodOutWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{prodSourceCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{prodUserType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{prodSource,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{prodLuno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodDclFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{prodPlanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodMakeJz,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{prodOriId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodParentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodOutPlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodSaleSerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodOutCarno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodOutDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{prodCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodCustomer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodBc,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{prodFhck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodRuc,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{prodWccply,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{prodInputuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodCheckuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update bsl_product_info set prod_id = #{record.prodId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_name = #{record.prodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_type = #{record.prodType,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_norm = #{record.prodNorm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_material = #{record.prodMaterial,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_length = #{record.prodLength,jdbcType=REAL}, prod_level = #{record.prodLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_num = #{record.prodNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prod_record_weight = #{record.prodRecordWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, prod_rel_weight = #{record.prodRelWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, prod_print_weight = #{record.prodPrintWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, prod_out_weight = #{record.prodOutWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, prod_source_company = #{record.prodSourceCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_status = #{record.prodStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_user_type = #{record.prodUserType,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_source = #{record.prodSource,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_luno = #{record.prodLuno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_dcl_flag = #{record.prodDclFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_plan_no = #{record.prodPlanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_make_jz = #{record.prodMakeJz,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_ori_id = #{record.prodOriId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_parent_no = #{record.prodParentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_out_plan = #{record.prodOutPlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_sale_serno = #{record.prodSaleSerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_out_carno = #{record.prodOutCarno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_out_date = #{record.prodOutDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, prod_company = #{record.prodCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_customer = #{record.prodCustomer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_bc = #{record.prodBc,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_fhck = #{record.prodFhck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_ruc = #{record.prodRuc,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_wccply = #{record.prodWccply,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_inputuser = #{record.prodInputuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_checkuser = #{record.prodCheckuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crt_date = #{record.crtDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upd_date = #{record.updDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bsl_product_info
prod_name = #{prodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prod_type = #{prodType,jdbcType=CHAR},
prod_norm = #{prodNorm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prod_material = #{prodMaterial,jdbcType=CHAR},
prod_length = #{prodLength,jdbcType=REAL},
prod_level = #{prodLevel,jdbcType=CHAR},

prod_rel_weight = #{prodRelWeight,jdbcType=REAL},
prod_print_weight = #{prodPrintWeight,jdbcType=REAL},
prod_out_weight = #{prodOutWeight,jdbcType=REAL},
prod_source_company = #{prodSourceCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prod_status = #{prodStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
prod_user_type = #{prodUserType,jdbcType=CHAR},
prod_source = #{prodSource,jdbcType=CHAR},

update bsl_product_info set prod_name = #{prodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_type = #{prodType,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_norm = #{prodNorm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_material = #{prodMaterial,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_length = #{prodLength,jdbcType=REAL}, prod_level = #{prodLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_num = #{prodNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prod_record_weight = #{prodRecordWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, prod_rel_weight = #{prodRelWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, prod_print_weight = #{prodPrintWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, prod_out_weight = #{prodOutWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, prod_source_company = #{prodSourceCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_status = #{prodStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_user_type = #{prodUserType,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_source = #{prodSource,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_luno = #{prodLuno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_dcl_flag = #{prodDclFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_plan_no = #{prodPlanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_make_jz = #{prodMakeJz,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_ori_id = #{prodOriId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_parent_no = #{prodParentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_out_plan = #{prodOutPlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_sale_serno = #{prodSaleSerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_out_carno = #{prodOutCarno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_out_date = #{prodOutDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, prod_company = #{prodCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_customer = #{prodCustomer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_bc = #{prodBc,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_fhck = #{prodFhck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_ruc = #{prodRuc,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_wccply = #{prodWccply,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_inputuser = #{prodInputuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_checkuser = #{prodCheckuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crt_date = #{crtDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upd_date = #{updDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where prod_id = #{prodId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select p1.prod_out_carno, c.wx_flag, p1.prod_plan_no, p1.prod_luno, p1.prod_name, p1.prod_norm, e1.enum_value prod_material, p1.prod_length, p1.sum_prod_num, p1.sum_prod_weight, p1.prod_ruc, e2.enum_value prod_level, q.chemical_C, q.chemical_C, q.chemical_Mn, q.chemical_Si, q.chemical_S, q.chemical_P, q.chemical_Ti, q.chemical_Ni, q.chemical_Cr, q.chemical_Cu, q.chemical_Nb, case when p1.prod_norm = 'F86*86*8' or p1.prod_norm = '86*86*8' then ROUND(q.mechanical_s * 1.12)else ROUND(q.mechanical_s * 1.1) end mechanical_s, case when p1.prod_norm = 'F86*86*8' or p1.prod_norm = '86*86*8' then ROUND(q.mechanical_b * 1.05) else ROUND(q.mechanical_b * 1.03) end mechanical_b, case when p1.prod_norm = 'F86*86*8' or p1.prod_norm = '86*86*8' then ROUND(q.mechanical_l - 5) else ROUND(q.mechanical_l - 3) end mechanical_l, case when q.impact_T is null then 20 else ROUND(q.impact_T) end impact_T, case when q.impact_N1 is null or q.impact_N1 = '' then '合格' else q.impact_N1 end impact_N1, case when q.impact_N2 is null or q.impact_N2 = '' then '合格' else q.impact_N2 end impact_N2, case when q.impact_N3 is null or q.impact_N3 = '' then '合格' else q.impact_N3 end impact_N3, case when q.bendWC is null or q.bendWC = '' then '合格' else q.bendWC end bendWC, case when q.bendYB is null or q.bendYB = '' then '合格' else q.bendYB end bendYB from( select p.prod_out_carno, p.prod_plan_no, p.prod_luno, p.prod_name, p.prod_norm, p.prod_material, p.prod_length, p.prod_ruc, sum(p.prod_num) sum_prod_num, sum(p.prod_rel_weight) sum_prod_weight, p.prod_level from bsl_product_info p where p.prod_status in ('4','7')
and prod_out_carno in
#{item}
group by p.prod_out_carno,p.prod_plan_no,p.prod_luno,p.prod_name, p.prod_norm,p.prod_material,p.prod_length,p.prod_level,p.prod_ruc ) p1 left join bsl_luno_quality q on p1.prod_luno = q.lu_id left join bsl_enum_info e1 on e1.enum_english_name = 'prodMaterial' and e1.enum_key = p1.prod_material left join bsl_enum_info e2 on e2.enum_english_name = 'prodLevel' and e2.enum_key = p1.prod_level left join bsl_car_retcha_info c on p1.prod_out_carno = c.car_no
mapper.update: insert into bsl_product_info_h select * from bsl_product_info t where t.upd_date is not null and #{dateString,jdbcType=VARCHAR} >= DATE_FORMAT(t.upd_date,'%Y%m%d') and t.prod_status in ('3','4','6')
delete from bsl_product_info where upd_date is not null and #{dateString,jdbcType=VARCHAR} >= DATE_FORMAT(upd_date,'%Y%m%d') and prod_status in ('3','4','6')
mapper.select: select * from bsl_product_info where prod_out_date = (select min(prod_out_date) from bsl_product_info t where t.prod_type = '1' and t.prod_status = '2' and t.prod_out_plan = #{prodOutPlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) order by prod_id
select * from bsl_product_info t where t.prod_type = '1' and t.prod_status = '2' and t.prod_out_plan = #{prodOutPlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by t.prod_out_date,t.prod_id limit 2
